Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたの、<Veigue>？ 考え込んじゃってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter, <Veigue>? You seem to be brooding over something.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアがさらわれた時の事を夢に見た…… 結局、オレはまたクレアを助けられずに……
Entry.EnglishText: I dreamt about the time Claire was kidnapped... And once again, I was unable to save her...

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度ならず二度も……オレは……
Entry.EnglishText: Not just once, but twice... I...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、今度こそ助けるために、 ボクたちは旅をしてるんじゃないか。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, we're on this journey so that we can save Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: 元気出して、がんばろうよ、ネ！
Entry.EnglishText: So cheer up and give it your best!
Yeah, you're right... This time I'll...
